::Epyon::

He spun his saber around, destroying both missiles. The explosian could
still hurt both Epyon and Perndabot. Epyon held his position as fire
surronded his body. When it cleared he was ready for battle.

::Hot Rod::

He saw the explosian and came running. Seeing what was going on, he
launched two missiles at Perndabot.
